::Halucigen::
Halucigen's eyes widened as the monster kept flying at him.
"AHHHHHHHHH" he let out a scream like a coward and turned to fly away
but Prowl's gian mouth got his leg. He turned and with his quick
calculations figured the only thing to do was to shoot his leg off.
His scorpion tail whipped up fireing an Corrosive Rocket at his leg
and mouth of hte beast. It hit his leg and the metal was burned away
by the dangerous acid
"AHHHHHRRRGGHH!" he screamed again. With his leg off he fell towards
the ground but his wings reacted and he tried to fly away.
"I uncovered something....that beats my worse nightmare by far..." he
croaked to himself....


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Actually, Prowl's mind snapped, or else he wouldn't have TFed into his

>
>
> ::Prowl::
>
> Prowl's mind was only half-concious, the other half being the beast
> that was chasing Halucigen and imaginary Megatron. The dreams were
> calming the Prowl half, though, but the beast was still chasing
> Halucigen, quickly gaining on him thanks to the thrust of Prowl's huge
> wings.
>
> He snapped his head forward, trying to get Halucigen inbetween his
> jaws, just as he was trying to get Megatron.
